header.title: Family Legacy Project Management
header.subtitle: Organize and manage your family's legacy planning projects

resources.noResourcesSubtitle: Add templates, documents, or helpful links

emptyState.noProjectsFilterMessage: Try adjusting your filters to see more projects
emptyState.noProjectsCreateMessage: Create your first legacy project to start organizing your family planning

comprehensiveWill.name: Comprehensive Will Creation
comprehensiveWill.description: Complete will creation with legal review and family consultation

gatherInfo.title: Gather personal information and assets
gatherInfo.description: Compile all necessary personal and financial information

defineBeneficiaries.title: Define beneficiaries and inheritance wishes
defineBeneficiaries.description: Clearly define who gets what and under what conditions

draftWill.title: Draft initial will document
draftWill.description: Create the first draft using legal templates

familyReview.title: Family review and feedback
familyReview.description: Share draft with family for input and discussion

legalReview.title: Professional legal review
legalReview.description: Have attorney review and validate the will

finalizeWill.title: Finalize and execute will
finalizeWill.description: Complete final signing and witnessing process

infoComplete.title: Information Collection Complete
infoComplete.description: All personal and asset information gathered

firstDraft.title: First Draft Complete
firstDraft.description: Initial will document is ready for review
firstDraft.rewards: Major milestone - will is taking shape

willExecuted.title: Will Legally Executed
willExecuted.description: Will is signed, witnessed, and legally valid
willExecuted.rewards: Family protection is now legally secured

emergencyPlanning.name: Family Emergency Planning
emergencyPlanning.description: Comprehensive emergency preparedness and response planning

contactDatabase.title: Create emergency contact database
contactDatabase.description: Compile all important emergency contact information

emergencyKits.title: Prepare emergency kits
emergencyKits.description: Assemble physical emergency kits for each household

contactsEstablished.title: Emergency Contacts Established
contactsEstablished.description: All family members have access to emergency contacts
contactsEstablished.rewards: Quick access to help in emergencies

planComplete.title: Emergency Plan Complete
planComplete.rewards: Family is prepared for any emergency

familyHistory.name: Family History Documentation
familyHistory.description: Preserve family history through stories, photos, and recordings

interviews.title: Interview family elders
interviews.description: Record stories and memories from older family members

digitizePhotos.title: Digitize family photos
digitizePhotos.description: Scan and organize historical family photographs

interviewsComplete.title: Elder Interviews Complete
interviewsComplete.description: All available elder interviews have been recorded

archiveComplete.title: Family Archive Complete
archiveComplete.description: Complete digital family history archive is ready
archiveComplete.rewards: Family legacy is documented for future generations
